comment.author: 45621760@N00
comment._content: Interesting! The building is still there, and it's still a bank. But it has been quite drastically rebuilt. It's on the corner Adelgatan-Bruksgatan. img72.imageshack.us/img72/3826/sebanken.jpg

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
olga s: Thanks a lot for locating and thanks for the link. (Should it be Östergatan-Bruksgatan?) Yes, the building as well as the surroundings has really changed over time! 
/Anna B.

comment.author: 45621760@N00
comment._content: Yes, you're right - it's Östergatan! It changes name right there.
